thread.section_title: Hotel Eldorado - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Quaint hotel
thread.title_full: Quaint hotel - Review of Hotel Eldorado, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tamsin F
title: Quaint hotel
text:
I booked the hotel using booking.com abd had no idea about price and value.
Hotel Eldorado is quaint. My room is tiny with en suite lavatory and basin the shower is next door and is shared. I didn't realyse this until after I booked and was a bit apprehensive.
I arrived on a very early flight and enquired about early check in. They were not amenable and I booked an extra night.
From my arrival the staff were lovely. I was on the 3rd floor and there is no lift but I'm relatively young and strong!
The shared bathroom is fine and the rooms are spotless.
I ate at Le Bistro des Dames last night and it was good.
The position suited me well and it's a lovely walk down to many of the sites. The hotel is clean and pleasant but please don't expect George V - you certainly aren't paying for it!
